creator: apache7@chris-lott.org
text:
This user document has a few confusing items that make getting started rather
difficult, most notably the names of the thread groups.

creator: apache7@chris-lott.org
text:
Created attachment 19684
Fix up names etc.

Hope this patch is usable and useful.

creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
Thanks. I've updated build-jms-topic-test-plan.xml to add most of the text (had to remove an additional

that had crept in). However, I removed the suggested list of jars from Active MQ. This is partly because optional jars are described in Getting Started, and partly because I'm not sure all of the jars are really needed. [And by the way, they should be put in lib, not lib/ext] Can you confirm that you really need all of those jars? JMeter already includes commons-logging anyway, but are all the rest really needed?

Sorry, I cannot confirm that list of jars.  I copied that block over from the
user documentation "Building a JMS Point-to-Point Test" in the hope it would
help.  Just leaving it out might be the safest course of action.
creator: apache7@chris-lott.org

text:
OK, I see. Had not noticed that.

I'll move it from there to get-started and add a note that it may not be 
accurate.
creator: sebb@apache.org
